                                                                                                                        【教育部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%95%99%E5%B8%88%E8%B5%84%E6%A0%BC%E8%AF%81%E8%80%83%E8%AF%95%E6%8E%A8%E8%BF%9F%23&amp;from=default">#教师资格证考试推迟#</a>】据教育部官网，根据国家疫情防控工作决策部署，切实保障广大考生和涉考工作人员的生命安全和身体健康，经研究决定，2020年<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8A%E5%8D%8A%E5%B9%B4%E4%B8%AD%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A6%E6%95%99%E8%B5%84%E8%80%83%E8%AF%95%E6%8E%A8%E8%BF%9F%E8%87%B3%E4%B8%8B%E5%8D%8A%E5%B9%B4%23&amp;from=default">#上半年中小学教资考试推迟至下半年#</a>一并组织实施。上半年已报名缴费的考生可申请转至2020年下半年考试或申请退费，前期已通过的笔试科目成绩和 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEN901wlB" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497220340362675:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497220340362675&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【正在直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%80%E8%B5%B7%E4%BA%91%E7%AB%AF%E8%B5%8F%E7%8F%A0%E5%B3%B0%23&amp;from=default">#一起云端赏珠峰#</a>】每年5月是珠穆朗玛峰的最佳攀登季节。在登山季来临之前，5G信号进入珠峰！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 继续慢直播，带你云端赏珠峰，感受雪域高原盛景↓↓一起围观！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497214493729634:1034-video:1034%3A4497303118217230:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497214493729634:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wd2va6" alt="http://t.cn/A6wd2va6" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div node-type="feed_list_repeat" class="WB_feed_repeat S_bg1" style=""><!-- 评论盖楼 -->

                                                                                                                        【今晚8点，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%BA%E9%84%82%E4%B8%8B%E5%8D%95%23&amp;from=default">#为鄂下单#</a>第四场：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%90%8C%E9%A5%AE%E9%95%BF%E6%B1%9F%E6%B0%B4%E5%8A%A9%E9%84%82%E6%9D%A5%E4%BE%9D%E8%BD%AE%23&amp;from=default">#同饮长江水助鄂来依轮#</a>！】<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 系列公益带货直播第四场，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%BD%98%E9%95%BF%E6%B1%9F?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=潘长江">@潘长江</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%9E%97%E4%BE%9D%E8%BD%AE?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=林依轮">@林依轮</a> 携手北京协和医院首批援鄂医生，带来最具特色的湖北夜市小吃。热干面、排骨莲藕汤、花甲粉…已经统统安排上了。你想买点儿啥？今晚一起下单！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497193216253897" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEMrfqeVj?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 11:11" date="1587697879000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497193216253897:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 11:11</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【5月起，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%89%E5%BE%BD%E5%B0%86%E5%8F%AF%E6%90%BA%E5%B8%A6%E5%AF%BC%E7%9B%B2%E7%8A%AC%E4%BE%9D%E8%A7%84%E5%87%BA%E5%85%A5%E5%85%AC%E5%85%B1%E5%9C%BA%E6%89%80%23&amp;from=default">#安徽将可携带导盲犬依规出入公共场所#</a>】5月1日起，《安徽省无障碍环境建设管理办法》施行。办法规定，视力残疾人可依规携带导盲犬出入公共场所及搭乘公共交通工具，公共场所工作人员应按国家有关规定提供无障碍服务。导盲犬是温顺聪明、训练有素的工作犬。爱同行，不拒绝！支持的转！ ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEMrfqeVj" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497193216253897:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497193216253897&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609498869&amp;ssig=8NwoF8HyBQ" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497186701907381" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEMgK80cd?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 10:45" date="1587696326000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497186701907381:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 10:45</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%A9%E9%97%AE%E4%B8%80%E5%8F%B7%E7%9A%84%E5%90%8D%E5%AD%97%E6%98%AF%E6%80%8E%E4%B9%88%E6%9D%A5%E7%9A%84%23&amp;from=default">#天问一号的名字是怎么来的#</a>？】今天，备受关注的中国首次火星探测任务名称公布——“天问一号”。据介绍，该名称源于屈原长诗《天问》。探求科学真理征途漫漫，追求科技创新永无止境。转发了解↓<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%A5%BD%E5%A4%A9%E9%97%AE%E4%B8%80%E5%8F%B7%23&amp;from=default">#你好天问一号#</a>！ ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>
                                                                                                                        <li><a href="javascript:void(0);" node-type="" action-type="fl_historyEdit" action-data="mid=4497178531264528&amp;domain=100206&amp;is_ori=1&amp;can_edit_count=99" suda-uatrack="">查看编辑记录</a></li>
                                                                                            <li>
                                <span class="hover">
                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IEM3z5iXC&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Frmrb&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

                            </li>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609498869&amp;ssig=8NwoF8HyBQ" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497178531264528" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEM3z5iXC?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 10:12" date="1587694378000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497178531264528:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 10:12</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8F%BD%E6%98%9F%E4%B9%9D%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#揽星九天#</a>！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E5%9B%BD%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E7%81%AB%E6%98%9F%E6%8E%A2%E6%B5%8B%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1%E6%A0%87%E8%AF%86%23&amp;from=default">#我国首次火星探测任务标识#</a>发布<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/14/2018new_weiwu_org.png" title="[威武]" alt="[威武]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】今天是第五个“中国航天日”，备受关注的中国首次火星探测任务名称、任务标识在2020年“中国航天日”启动仪式上公布。中国行星探测任务被命名为“天问（Tianwen）系列”，首次火星探测任务被命名为“天问一号”，后续行星任务依次编号。<br>据介绍， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEM3z5iXC" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497178531264528:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497178531264528&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="layer_menu_list" style="display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 999;" node-type="fl_menu_right">

                                                                                <li><a action-type="thrid_rend_iframe" href="javascript:void(0)" suda-data="" action-data="width=660&amp;height=556&amp;mid=4497176392975278&amp;src=%2F%2Fpromote.vip.weibo.com%2Fpromoteadvance%3Fdai_tou%3Dpc_profile_01%26touid%3D2803301701%26mid%3D4497176392975278&amp;title=推广" title="帮上头条">帮上头条</a></li>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#人民直播#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%B0%86%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E7%81%AB%E6%98%9F%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1%E5%90%8D%E7%A7%B0%23&amp;from=default">#中国将发布火星任务名称#</a>，共同关注！】今年，中国航天日的主题是“传承航天精神，拥抱星辰大海”。航天日启动仪式主要环节包括“中国航天日”旗帜交接、公布2020年“中国航天日”公益形象大使、发布中国行星探测任务标识及名称等。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播，一起期待！&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IELYC4lSG" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497175461037426:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497175461037426&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                         <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497163856158772" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IELFTpQb2?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 09:14" date="1587690879000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497163856158772:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 09:14</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/19DcdW" rel="nofollow">微博视频</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【致敬中国航天人！50年前的今天，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%87%E5%AE%99%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E6%AC%A1%E5%90%AC%E8%A7%81%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%A3%B0%E9%9F%B3%23&amp;from=default">#宇宙第一次听见中国声音#</a>】1970年4月24日，中国第一颗人造地球卫星“东方红一号”发射成功，中国探索宇宙奥秘的序幕由此拉开。50年，从第一颗人造地球卫星到300多颗中国印记罗布星河；宇宙浩瀚，星空灿烂。致敬夜空中最亮的那些星！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%9C%E6%96%B9%E7%BA%A2%E4%B8%80%E5%8F%B7%E5%8F%91%E5%B0%84%E6%88%90%E5%8A%9F50%E5%91%A8%E5%B9%B4%23&amp;from=default">#东方红一号发射成功50周年#</a> ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IELFTpQb2" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497163856158772:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497163856158772&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E6%97%A0%E7%97%87%E7%8A%B6%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%9334%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增无症状感染34例#</a>】4月23日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增无症状感染者34例，其中境外输入无症状感染者1例；当日转为确诊病例3例（无境外输入）；当日解除医学观察36例（境外输入10例）；尚在医学观察无症状感染者979例（境外输入157例）。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%98%A8%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E2%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#昨日新增2例境外输入病例#</a>】据国家卫健委通报，4月23日0—24时，新增2例境外输入病例。境外输入现有确诊病例769例（含重症病例32例），现有疑似病例17例。累计确诊病例1618例，累计治愈出院病例849例，无死亡病例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E6%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增6例新冠肺炎#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%98%A8%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E4%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#昨日新增4例本土病例#</a>】4月23日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例6例，其中2例为境外输入病例，4例为本土病例（黑龙江3例，广东1例）；无新增死亡病例；新增疑似病例2例，均为境外输入疑似病例（上海2例）。<br>　　当日新增治愈出院病 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IELsF6bMb" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497155651475239:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497155651475239&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" href="javascript:void(0);" action-data="cid=4497177818173900&amp;is_more=1&amp;type=small&amp;ouid=" action-type="commentDialogue">查看对话</a></span></li>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E4%B8%80%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%9C%9F%E9%97%B4%E7%8C%AE%E8%A1%803%E6%AC%A1%23&amp;from=default">#武汉一护士疫情期间献血3次#</a>，坚持献血17年累计献血140次<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/e6/2018new_zan_org.png" title="[赞]" alt="[赞]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】38岁的胡倩华是武汉市二七社区卫生服务中心计划免疫科护士。当她得知要去往医学观察点驻守后，第二天便赶到武汉血液中心去献血。献血隔天，她前往隔离点支援。坚守了16天后，胡倩华到单位安排的观察点隔离。隔离期满后，她再次捐献了2 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IELokvX7M" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497152967615446:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497152967615446&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E3%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#黑龙江新增3例本土病例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F%E6%98%A8%E6%97%A5%E6%97%A0%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#黑龙江昨日无新增境外输入病例#</a>】2020年4月23日0-24时，黑龙江省省内新增确诊病例3例（大庆1例、哈尔滨本土无症状感染者转为确诊病例2例），其中：哈尔滨新增2例中，有1例为确诊病例陈某君（男，87岁）在哈医大一院住院期间同楼层同病区住院患者王某惠（4月16日确诊病例） ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IELb5kvhl" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497144754886799:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497144754886799&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【今天，骄傲转发，祝福中国航天！】今天，是第五个中国航天日，也是<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%9C%E6%96%B9%E7%BA%A2%E4%B8%80%E5%8F%B7%E5%8F%91%E5%B0%84%E6%88%90%E5%8A%9F50%E5%91%A8%E5%B9%B4%23&amp;from=default">#东方红一号发射成功50周年#</a>。如今，仰望星空，北斗环绕，嫦娥伴月，神舟起航；俯瞰大地，导航定位，遥感监测，卫星通信…星河浩瀚，我们从未停止探索的脚步！数读<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E8%88%AA%E5%A4%A9%E7%A1%AC%E6%A0%B8%E6%88%90%E5%B0%B1%23&amp;from=default">#中国航天硬核成就#</a>↓↓致敬中国航天人，我们的征途是星辰大海！ ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

</div></div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497135775481693" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEKWBn02p?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 07:23" date="1587684184000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497135775481693:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 07:23</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E9%A6%96%E6%AC%A1%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%87%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%23&amp;from=default">#意大利新增治愈首次超过新增确诊#</a>】意大利民事保护部门23日发布的数据显示，意大利当天新增新冠治愈病例3033例，新增确诊病例2646例。这是意大利疫情暴发以来新增治愈病例数首次超过新增确诊病例数，显示疫情进一步好转。<br><a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497135775481693:3000000055-webpage:3000000055%3Ac0930a25550d53ac05c9896967454df6" title="意大利新增治愈病例首次超过新增确诊病例" href="http://t.cn/A6wr5Tal" alt="http://t.cn/A6wr5Tal" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>意大利新增治愈病例首次超过新增确诊病例</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        </div>
                         <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497134072565674" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEKTRaLrQ?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 07:16" date="1587683778000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497134072565674:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 07:16</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E4%BC%97%E8%AE%AE%E9%99%A2%E8%B0%83%E6%9F%A5%E7%89%B9%E6%9C%97%E6%99%AE%E6%94%BF%E5%BA%9C%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%BA%94%E5%AF%B9%23&amp;from=default">#美众议院调查特朗普政府疫情应对#</a>】据美媒报道，美国国会众议院23日投票通过成立特别调查委员会，以审查特朗普政府对新冠疫情的应对以及经济救助计划的执行情况，包括政府对检测和隔离等问题的处理，设备和医疗用品的分发等。（央视） ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-24 07:16</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【今天，转发纪念！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%9C%E6%96%B9%E7%BA%A2%E4%B8%80%E5%8F%B7%E5%8F%91%E5%B0%84%E6%88%90%E5%8A%9F50%E5%91%A8%E5%B9%B4%23&amp;from=default">#东方红一号发射成功50周年#</a>】今天，第五个中国航天日。50年前的今天，长征一号运载火箭成功发射东方红一号卫星，中国正式开启了太空时代。一起转，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%A5%9D%E7%A6%8F%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E8%88%AA%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#祝福中国航天#</a>；你好，星辰大海！&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497129986514502:1034-video:1034%3A4497129469575183:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497129986514502:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wrbgU6" alt="http://t.cn/A6wrbgU6" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497125994089409" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEKGPh9Qd?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 06:44" date="1587681852000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497125994089409:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 06:44</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8A%97%E4%BD%93%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%E6%98%BE%E7%A4%BA1%2F5%E7%BA%BD%E7%BA%A6%E4%BA%BA%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E5%B7%B2%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%23&amp;from=default">#抗体检测显示1/5纽约人可能已感染#</a>】当地时间4月23日，纽约州州长安德鲁·科莫表示，对该州3000名居民进行的一项随机测试发现，13.9%的参与者新冠病毒抗体检测呈阳性。分析称，该结果表明纽约州可能已有270万人感染过新冠病毒。在3000名参与者中，约1300人来自纽约市，这部分人员的检测阳性率达到了2 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEKGPh9Qd" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497125994089409:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497125994089409&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4497124538713439" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEKEtAyLl?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-24 06:38" date="1587681504000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497124538713439:fromprofile"> 2020-4-24 06:38</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%B6%85%E8%BF%8786%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#美国新冠病毒感染病例超过86万#</a>】据美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学疫情实时监测系统显示，截至美东时间4月23日下午5时41分，美国已至少有新冠病毒感染病例864415例，包括死亡病例47892例。与该系统大约24小时前的数据相比，美国新增感染病例17433例，新增死亡病例1283例。<br>当前，疫情最严重的纽约州有确诊 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEKEtAyLl" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4497124538713439:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4497124538713439&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/yixinyan" usercard="id=1770939097">纸扎铺老板娘</a><a class="icon_icon" title="微博铁粉" target="_blank" href="https://car.weibo.com/pc/view?page=123456"><i class="W_icon_bf icon_bigfans4"></i></a>：司马迁说，美国人固有一死，或死于新冠，或死于贷款。&nbsp;&nbsp;他们现在面临着一个两难的选择题：&nbsp;&nbsp;复工可能病死，和不复工一定饿死。&nbsp;&nbsp;这倒让我想起本山大叔的小品：&nbsp;&nbsp;人生最痛苦的事情是什么？ 人死了，钱没花完。 人生最最痛苦的事情是什么？ 人活着，钱花没了。        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%A5%BD%EF%BC%8C%E6%98%8E%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#你好，明天#</a>】我国成年人人均阅读纸质书4.65本，世界读书日亮起提示灯。无论电子书还是纸质书，只要读进去便是好事。脚步丈量不到的地方，文字可以。把读书当成一种生活方式，我们就会更谦卑更自信，找到更丰富的精神原乡，看见更辽阔的人生天空。在这个特殊的春天，愿阅读让心灵更宁静、更丰盈。 ​​​​                                            </div>

    <div class="list_con" node-type="replywrap">
        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/6900693505" usercard="id=6900693505">散装悟语</a>：读世间书，也读天地书；读有字书，也读无字书；读古今圣贤，也读世态人心。最忌关起门来读书，要敞开心扉，海纳百川，容得下不同观点的交锋，在大风大浪中磨砺，在坎坷不平中成长，才能成为一个通达、睿智、大气的读书人。 ——写在世界读书日，散装记于家中。        </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4497010578998319" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEHGFBKSb?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-23 23:05" date="1587654335000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4497010578998319:fromprofile"> 2020-4-23 23:05</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%B6%85400%E6%9E%B6%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E9%A3%9E%E6%9C%BA%E5%81%9C%E5%9C%A8%E8%8D%92%E6%BC%A0%E9%87%8C%23&amp;from=default">#超400架美国飞机停在荒漠里#</a>】美国加利福尼亚州的一处前空军基地，最近成为世界上最大“停机坪”之一。由于地处干旱荒漠中，飞机生锈风险小，因疫情停飞的多家航空公司飞机停在此处。目前，已有超过400架飞机静静排列在跑道上。据了解，该基地最多可容纳500架飞机。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4497010578998319:2017607-video:2017607%3A4497004546424847:page_100206_home:2803301701:4497010578998319:2803301701" title="世面的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wBMdbn" alt="http://t.cn/A6wBMdbn" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>世面的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4496999455526405" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEHoJnbFz?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-23 22:21" date="1587651682000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4496999455526405:fromprofile"> 2020-4-23 22:21</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【农业农村部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%95%BF%E6%B1%9F%E6%B5%81%E5%9F%9F332%E4%B8%AA%E6%B0%B4%E7%94%9F%E7%94%9F%E7%89%A9%E4%BF%9D%E6%8A%A4%E5%8C%BA%E5%B7%B2%E5%85%A8%E9%9D%A2%E7%A6%81%E6%8D%95%23&amp;from=default">#长江流域332个水生生物保护区已全面禁捕#</a>】23日，农业农村部等三部委联合召开长江流域禁捕和渔民安置保障工作部署推进视频会。会议指出，我国<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E9%9D%A2%E5%90%AF%E5%8A%A8%E9%95%BF%E6%B1%9F%E7%A6%81%E6%8D%95%E5%8F%96%E5%BE%97%E9%98%B6%E6%AE%B5%E6%80%A7%E6%88%90%E6%95%88%23&amp;from=default">#全面启动长江禁捕取得阶段性成效#</a>。目前，长江流域332个水生生物保护区率先实现全面禁捕，约12.8万名退捕渔民通过就业服务、生活补助、医疗社 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEHoJnbFz" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4496999455526405:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4496999455526405&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2803301701/IEHoJnbFz&amp;mid=4496999455526405&amp;name=人民日报&amp;uid=2803301701&amp;domain=rmrb&amp;pid=a716fd45ly1ge42cinmqhj210b0n5tgu" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>400</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609498879&amp;ssig=%2FpF%2BGPgmZj" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4496992170730440" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEHcZ341i?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-23 21:52" date="1587649946000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4496992170730440:fromprofile"> 2020-4-23 21:52</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/PBP2P" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【夜读：你只是看起来爱读书】人人都说读书好，但却不是每个人都能真正静下心来认真读书。许多人，都只是看起来爱读书而已。真正能从读书中获得益处和乐趣的人，往往愿意安心地等那个好结果出现，而不会要求立刻“变现”。或许，对阅读保有悦纳心和敬畏心，才是阅读时应有的心态。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEHcZ341i" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4496992170730440:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4496992170730440&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【七部门：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%95%99%E5%B8%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E8%88%B9%E5%91%98%E7%AD%89%E8%81%8C%E4%B8%9A%E5%8F%AF%E5%85%88%E4%B8%8A%E5%B2%97%E5%86%8D%E8%80%83%E8%AF%81%23&amp;from=default">#教师护士船员等职业可先上岗再考证#</a>】近日，人社部、教育部、司法部等7部门印发通知，提出对教师资格、护士执业资格、渔业船员资格等职业资格实施“先上岗、再考证”阶段性措施。通知提出，对于教师资格、护士执业资格、渔业船员资格、执业兽医资格、演出经纪人员资格、专利代理师资格等， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEGYS53Qr" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4496983421206423:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4496983421206423&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E5%AE%BF%E7%AE%A1%E7%BB%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E6%99%92%E8%A2%AB%E5%AD%90%23&amp;from=default">#高校组织宿管给学生晒被子#</a>，网友：又是别人家的大学<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/4a/2018new_xiaoku_thumb.png" title="[笑cry]" alt="[笑cry]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】4月22日，浙江农林大学<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%8D%E8%AF%BE%E5%89%8D%E5%AE%BF%E7%AE%A1%E9%98%BF%E5%A7%A8%E5%B8%AE%E5%90%8C%E5%AD%A6%E6%99%92%E8%A2%AB%E5%AD%90%23&amp;from=default">#复课前宿管阿姨帮同学晒被子#</a>。此前学校通知复课后，有晒被子需求的学生可通过联系所在公寓的宿管阿姨帮忙晒被子。阿姨们则会根据学生预约需求给每条被子做好标记。还没返校的大学生们，你宿舍的被子还好吗？ ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%BE%AE%E8%AF%84%23&amp;from=default">#人民微评#</a>：中华民族懂得感恩！】从赠药到馈赠防疫物资，再次说明中华民族是懂得感恩、投桃报李的民族。这则暖人身心的互动，生动诠释了一句德国谚语：“山和山不相遇，人和人要相逢”。国之交在于民相亲、民相亲在于心相通，多一些这样的守望，我们就能早日战胜疫情，续写更多佳话。                                            </div>

                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        【延续80年的情谊！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%97%E4%BA%AC%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%84%E9%80%81%E5%88%B0%E6%8B%89%E8%B4%9D%E4%B9%8B%E5%AD%99%E6%89%8B%E4%B8%AD%23&amp;from=default">#南京抗疫物资送到拉贝之孙手中#</a>】21日，南京市政府筹集的一批防疫物资送到拉贝之孙托马斯·拉贝手中。托马斯·拉贝激动地说，在这一特殊时刻，来自中国的馈赠让他再一次深刻地认识到，中国人民从来不会忘记向朋友施以援手。他向中国政府和人民、向南京市政府、向中国大使馆表达最诚挚 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4496872112912395:2803301701" href="/2803301701/IEE5lcdE7" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4496872112912395">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%A4%96%E7%A7%91%E5%AD%A6%E5%AE%B6%E7%BB%98%E5%88%B6%E8%BF%84%E4%BB%8A%E6%9C%80%E7%B2%BE%E7%A1%AE%E9%93%B6%E6%B2%B3%E7%B3%BB%E7%BB%93%E6%9E%84%E5%9B%BE%23&amp;from=default">#中外科学家绘制迄今最精确银河系结构图#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%93%B6%E6%B2%B3%E7%B3%BB%E6%9C%894%E6%9D%A1%E6%97%8B%E8%87%82%23&amp;from=default">#银河系有4条旋臂#</a>】据南京大学消息，中美德科学家组成的国际科研团队绘制出尺度为10万x 10万光年的全新银河系结构图。该图是迄今最精确的银河系结构图，它清晰地展示银河系是一个具有四条旋臂的棒旋星系，彻底解决了银河系究竟有几条旋臂这个天文学中长期 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEGlC5PUR" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4496959081391209:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4496959081391209&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                        【明天<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%B0%86%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E7%81%AB%E6%98%9F%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1%E5%90%8D%E7%A7%B0%23&amp;from=default">#中国将发布火星任务名称#</a>，转发期待！】2020年4月24日，是第5个中国航天日，也是<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%9C%E6%96%B9%E7%BA%A2%E4%B8%80%E5%8F%B7%E5%8F%91%E5%B0%84%E6%88%90%E5%8A%9F50%E5%91%A8%E5%B9%B4%23&amp;from=default">#东方红一号发射成功50周年#</a>。届时中国首次火星探测任务名称、任务标识将正式公开。你心中的火星探测器名称是什么？2020，向火星出发，一起拥抱星辰大海！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E7%9A%84%E5%A4%AA%E7%A9%BA?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=我们的太空">@我们的太空</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4496947047809945:1034-video:1034%3A4496944672997388:page_100206_home:2803301701:4496947047809945:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6w1WCmQ" alt="http://t.cn/A6w1WCmQ" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            </div>

        </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4496938538103769" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEFOty09X?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-23 18:19" date="1587637159000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4496938538103769:fromprofile"> 2020-4-23 18:19</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【高燃！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%B5%B7%E5%86%9B%E5%AE%B6%E6%97%8F%E7%94%9F%E6%97%A5%E5%85%A8%E5%AE%B6%E7%A6%8F%23&amp;from=default">#中国海军家族生日全家福#</a>】71年来，人民海军从无到有，从小到大，劈波斩浪，纵横海疆。四月以来，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BE%BD%E5%AE%81%E8%88%B0%E5%B1%B1%E4%B8%9C%E8%88%B0%E5%90%8C%E6%9C%88%E5%87%BA%E6%B5%B7%E5%AE%9E%E8%AE%AD%23&amp;from=default">#辽宁舰山东舰同月出海实训#</a>，首艘万吨大型驱逐舰南昌舰进行海上实战化训练。愿中国海军未来仗剑深蓝，犁水四方！戳视频看中国海军家族：水面舰艇、航空兵、海军陆战队、潜艇、岸防部队… ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEFOty09X" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4496938538103769:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4496938538103769&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【转存！教育部推荐高中生阅读的90本好书】知识可以检索，而思想只能磨砺。每个人的成长，都离不开书的指引。教育部<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%B0%8F%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E5%88%86%E7%BA%A7%E9%98%85%E8%AF%BB%E6%8C%87%E5%AF%BC%E7%9B%AE%E5%BD%95%23&amp;from=default">#中小学生分级阅读指导目录#</a>推荐的高中阶段值得一读的90本好书，戳↓↓你读过几本？ ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4496921941292968" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEFnI5qmk?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-23 17:13" date="1587633202000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4496921941292968:fromprofile"> 2020-4-23 17:13</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23CNN%E8%AE%B0%E8%80%85%E6%97%B6%E9%9A%94%E4%B8%89%E4%B8%AA%E6%9C%88%E9%87%8D%E8%BF%94%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#CNN记者时隔三个月重返武汉#</a>：有点超现实】22日，一名CNN记者时隔近三个月后重返武汉，向观众展示了武汉现在恢复的状况。这名<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23CNN%E8%AE%B0%E8%80%85%E9%87%8D%E8%BF%94%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%90%8E%E4%BB%8B%E7%BB%8D%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%81%A5%E5%BA%B7%E7%A0%81%23&amp;from=default">#CNN记者重返武汉后介绍中国健康码#</a>，还介绍了中国的公众戴口罩情况和应对境外输入措施。他说，回想起接到电话被要求离开武汉的那天，再看到眼前这一切，真有点超现实。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEFnI5qmk" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4496921941292968:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4496921941292968&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>

                                <a name="4496913917555910" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEFaLvHDw?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-23 16:41" date="1587631289000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4496913917555910:fromprofile"> 2020-4-23 16:41</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【听！这是<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%B5%B7%E5%86%9B%E8%BF%87%E5%8E%BB%E4%B8%80%E5%B9%B4%E7%95%99%E4%B8%8B%E7%9A%84%E5%A3%B0%E9%9F%B3%23&amp;from=default">#人民海军过去一年留下的声音#</a>】海上阅兵式上的国歌声，首艘075两栖攻击舰下水的鸣笛声，山东号航母通过台湾海峡的演练声，辽宁号航母舰载机的轰鸣声…今天，人民海军成立71周年，7段声音记录了过去一年海军战士劈波斩浪、向海图强的征程。转起，祝<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%B5%B7%E5%86%9B%E7%94%9F%E6%97%A5%E5%BF%AB%E4%B9%90%23&amp;from=default">#人民海军生日快乐#</a>！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4496913917555910:2017607-video:2017607%3A4496788221001751:page_100206_home:2803301701:4496913917555910:2803301701" title="海客新闻的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wucDup" alt="http://t.cn/A6wucDup" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>海客新闻的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9C%A8%E6%97%A5%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9Fvlog%E8%AE%B0%E5%BD%95%E5%81%A5%E5%BA%B7%E5%8C%85%E5%8F%91%E6%94%BE%23&amp;from=default">#在日留学生vlog记录健康包发放#</a>】4月19日，日本神户大学一名博士留学生龙蕾领取了来自祖国的健康包，派发现场还有不少帮忙的志愿者。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E5%81%A5%E5%BA%B7%E5%8C%85%E4%B8%8A%E5%86%99%E7%9D%80%E7%A5%96%E5%9B%BD%E5%9C%A8%E4%BD%A0%E8%BA%AB%E8%BE%B9%23&amp;from=default">#留学生健康包上写着祖国在你身边#</a>，里面有2个N95口罩、1包日常用口罩、200张消毒纸巾等。有留学生说自己的口罩已经用光了：“果然祖国还是和我在一起。”（人民日 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEF1djQ6V" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4496907994728549:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4496907994728549&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【外交部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%86%8D%E5%90%91%E4%B8%96%E5%8D%AB%E6%8D%90%E6%AC%BE3%E5%8D%83%E4%B8%87%E7%BE%8E%E5%85%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%23&amp;from=default">#中国再向世卫捐款3千万美元抗疫#</a>】外交部发言人耿爽23日宣布，中国将在此前向世卫组织捐款2000万美元的基础上，再追加3000万美元现汇捐款，用以支持世卫组织开展抗击新冠肺炎疫情的国际合作。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4496901426118977:3000000001-webpage:3000000001%3A7343ec8835e54e562d9c8a4edaa50f57" title="耿爽：中国再捐3000万美元支持世卫组织抗击新..." href="http://t.cn/A6w3gYoy" alt="http://t.cn/A6w3gYoy" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>耿爽：中国再捐3000万美元支持世卫组织抗击新...</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E7%A7%91%E5%AD%A6%E9%99%A2%E7%A7%B0%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E5%8F%97%E6%B0%94%E6%B8%A9%E5%BD%B1%E5%93%8D%E5%B0%8F%23&amp;from=default">#中国科学院称新冠病毒受气温影响小#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%E6%98%AF%E5%90%A6%E4%BC%9A%E5%9B%A0%E6%B0%94%E6%B8%A9%E5%8D%87%E9%AB%98%E8%A2%AB%E9%81%8F%E5%88%B6%23&amp;from=default">#新冠病毒是否会因气温升高被遏制#</a>？中国科学院微生物研究所研究员施一介绍，气温升高时不利于病毒存活，但因病毒传播方式的不同，要对病毒进行区分。目前普遍认为新冠病毒通过飞沫和直接接触传播，受气温影响小，例如南半球天气炎热，但仍然有疫情发生。最终情 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEEHMzauw" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4496895948381812:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4496895948381812&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <p class="icon"><span class="W_icon icon_rederrorS"></span></p><p class="txt">由于用户设置，你无法回复评论。</p>

                                <a name="4496895059877950" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/IEEGlFrHM?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-23 15:26" date="1587626793000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4496895059877950:fromprofile"> 2020-4-23 15:26</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%BE%E6%8E%A7%E4%B8%93%E5%AE%B6%E7%AD%94%E4%BA%94%E4%B8%80%E5%81%87%E6%9C%9F%E8%83%BD%E5%90%A6%E5%87%BA%E8%A1%8C%23&amp;from=default">#疾控专家答五一假期能否出行#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%94%E4%B8%80%E5%81%87%E6%9C%9F%E5%87%BA%E8%A1%8C%E9%9C%80%E6%B3%A8%E6%84%8F%E4%BB%80%E4%B9%88%23&amp;from=default">#五一假期出行需注意什么#</a>】23日，中国疾控中心研究员冯录召表示，对于大部分近期无新增病例报告的地区来说，五一假期旅行比较安全，但仍需警惕感染风险，不建议老年人、慢性病患者、孕妇及高危人群出行旅游。对于出行人员，建议出行前做好准备，就近错峰出游；出行途 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEEGlFrHM" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4496895059877950:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4496895059877950&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【国家卫健委：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%8D%8A%E6%95%B0%E4%BB%A5%E4%B8%8A%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#境外输入病例半数以上治愈出院#</a>】国家卫生健康委新闻发言人、宣传司副司长米锋介绍，4月22日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E7%8E%B0%E6%9C%89%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E9%99%8D%E8%87%B32%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#湖北现有重症病例降至2例#</a>，全国现有确诊病例首次降至1000例以内，境外输入确诊病例已有半数以上治愈出院，但个别地方聚集性疫情确诊人数仍在增加，要尽快阻断传播途径，补上防控短板漏洞， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/IEEA7svNT" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4496891196795441:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4496891196795441&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#人民直播#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%A1%E9%99%A2%E8%81%94%E9%98%B2%E8%81%94%E6%8E%A7%E6%9C%BA%E5%88%B6%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#国务院联防联控机制发布会#</a>】国务院联防联控机制定于4月23日15时召开新闻发布会，介绍新冠肺炎防控的科学知识普及，有关专家回答媒体提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播↓↓一起关注！<br> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4496888491108736:1034-video:1034%3A4496898262761483:page_100206_home:2803301701:4496888491108736:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6w3umBZ" alt="http://t.cn/A6w3umBZ" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【习近平推荐的书，你读过几本？】近年来，习近平在多个场合讲述过他的读书故事，推荐过很多经典著作。4月23日是<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%AC%AC25%E4%B8%AA%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E8%AF%BB%E4%B9%A6%E6%97%A5%23&amp;from=default">#第25个世界读书日#</a>，送你一份习近平推荐的书单。愿你多读书，读好书！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【惊心动魄！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%9B%91%E6%8E%A7%E5%AE%9E%E6%8B%8D%E6%B0%91%E8%AD%A6%E6%8A%93%E6%8D%95%E6%B6%89%E6%AF%92%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%23&amp;from=default">#监控实拍民警抓捕涉毒人员#</a>】4月21日，陕西<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%A6%86%E6%9E%97%E5%85%AC%E5%AE%89?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=榆林公安">@榆林公安</a> 发布了一段惊心动魄的抓捕涉毒人员视频。监控实拍的视频中，民警徒手对抗汽车，被拽倒地瞬间站起，让人揪心不已。网友：真的是拿命在拼！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4496879318259344:1034-video:1034%3A4496079568437282:page_100206_home:2803301701:4496879318259344:2803301701" title="榆林公安的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wQvpoY" alt="http://t.cn/A6wQvpoY" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>榆林公安的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                             【5月起，<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%89%E5%BE%BD%E5%B0%86%E5%8F%AF%E6%90%BA%E5%B8%A6%E5%AF%BC%E7%9B%B2%E7%8A%AC%E4%BE%9D%E8%A7%84%E5%87%BA%E5%85%A5%E5%85%AC%E5%85%B1%E5%9C%BA%E6%89%80%23&from=default\">#安徽将可携带导盲犬依规出入公共场所#<\/a>】5月1日起，《安徽省无障碍环境建设管理办法》施行。办法规定，视力残疾人可依规携带导盲犬出入公共场所及搭乘公共交通工具，公共场所工作人员应按国家有关规定提供无障碍服务。导盲犬是温顺聪明、训练有素的工作犬。爱同行，不拒绝！支持的转！                                                                                                              【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%A9%E9%97%AE%E4%B8%80%E5%8F%B7%E7%9A%84%E5%90%8D%E5%AD%97%E6%98%AF%E6%80%8E%E4%B9%88%E6%9D%A5%E7%9A%84%23&from=default\">#天问一号的名字是怎么来的#<\/a>？】今天，备受关注的中国首次火星探测任务名称公布——“天问一号”。据介绍，该名称源于屈原长诗《天问》。探求科学真理征途漫漫，追求科技创新永无止境。转发了解↓<a                                                【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" class=\"W_img_face\" render=\"ext\" src=\"\/\/img.t.sinajs.cn\/t4\/appstyle\/expression\/ext\/normal\/14\/2018new_weiwu_org.png\" title=\"[威武]\" alt=    \"[威武]\" type=\"face\" \/>】今天是第五个“中国航天日”，备受关注的中国首次火星探测任务名称、任务标识在2020年“中国航天日”启动仪式上公布。中国行星探测任务被命名为“天问（Tianwen）系列”，首次火星探测任务被命名为“天问一号”，后续行星任务依次编号。<br>据介绍， ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\"                                                                                           【致敬中国航天人！50年前的今天，<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\"                                                【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\"                                                【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%98%A8%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E4%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&from=default\">#昨日新增4例本土病例#<\/a>】4月23日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例6例，其中2例为境外输入病例，4例为本土病例（黑龙江3例，广东1例）；无新增死亡病例；新增疑似病例2例，均为境外输入疑似病例（上海2例）。<br>　　当日新增治愈出院病
